name: Rise of the Footsoldier 2
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Still reeling from the murder of three close friends, gangster Carlton Leach tries to numb the pain through drugs and desire. But he soon realizes his path to salvation lies in climbing the ranks of the criminal underworld he abandoned. Once at the top, he plans to use his power to destroy his friends' killers once and for all... but power is a dangerous thing. This blistering true-life crime saga stars Craig Fairbrass, Charlie Heaton, Luke Mably, and Steven Berkoff.
